extracted_playbook.condition: Is it possible to apply the latest fixes?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Latest Fixes
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest security fixes to the VMware Cloud Director Appliance to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply VMware Workaround
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the workaround published by VMware if updating to the latest fixed version is not possible.

affected_products: VMware Cloud Director Appliance 10.5 (upgraded from 10.4.x or below)
